VaccinationGetDisease.name: Measles
VaccinationGetDisease.description: A highly contagious viral disease causing fever and rash.

VaccinationGetDisease.name: Mumps
VaccinationGetDisease.description: A viral infection that affects the salivary glands.

VaccinationGetDisease.name: Rubella
VaccinationGetDisease.description: A contagious viral infection best known by its distinctive red rash.

VaccinationGetDisease.name: Hepatitis B
VaccinationGetDisease.description: A serious liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus.

VaccinationGetDisease.name: Diphtheria
VaccinationGetDisease.description: A serious bacterial infection affecting the mucous membranes of the throat and nose.
